data.question: What is the chemical formula of MAF-34-Co?
What method was used for the potentiometric titration in the synthesis of MAF-34-CoRu?
data.answer: AgNO3 was used for potentiometric titration.

data.question: What is the CO production rate of MAF-34-CoRu under visible light irradiation in CH3CN/H2O?
What is the CO selectivity of MAF-34-CoRu for CO2 reduction products?
What is the role of ruthenium bipyridyl complexes in the photocatalytic process?
data.answer: Ruthenium bipyridyl complexes act as photosensitizers and water oxidation catalysts.

data.question: How does the photocatalyst MAF-34-CoRu achieve CO2 reduction and H2O oxidation?
data.answer: Electrons are excited from the Ru units and transferred to the Co units, leaving sufficient holes for H2O oxidation into O2.

data.question: Is the photocatalytic reaction of MAF-34-CoRu under visible light irradiation without additional sacrificial agents or photosensitizers?
Does MAF-34-CoRu exhibit a higher CO production rate than most single-phase catalysts for visible light-driven CO2 to CO conversion?
Can MAF-34-CoRu efficiently capture CO2?
Is the photocatalytic performance of MAF-34-CoRu in diluted CO2 atmosphere comparable to its performance in pure CO2?
What is the apparent quantum yield (AQY) of MAF-34-CoRu for the photocatalytic reaction?
What is the role of cobalt imidazolate units in MAF-34-CoRu?
data.answer: Cobalt imidazolate units demonstrate high CO2 reduction activities.

data.question: Does the photocatalytic activity of MAF-34-CoRu depend on the solvent ratio of CH3CN to H2O?
What is the effect of water content on the photocatalytic performance of MAF-34-CoRu?
data.answer: A moderate amount of H2O is beneficial for the reaction, but a higher water content can decrease the catalytic performance.

data.question: What is the stability of MAF-34-CoRu after 120 hours of photocatalytic experiments?
data.answer: MAF-34-CoRu shows high stability after 120 hours of photocatalytic experiments.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of MAF-34-CoRu?
What is the CO2 adsorption enthalpy of MAF-34-CoRu?
Does MAF-34-CoRu undergo reversible guest-induced structural deformation?
What is the role of the ultramicroporous structure of MAF-34-CoRu in its photocatalytic performance?
data.answer: The ultramicroporous structure with moderately strong CO2 adsorption ability enhances its photocatalytic performance.

data.question: Can MAF-34-CoRu work efficiently for the overall photosynthetic reaction under gas-phase conditions and even in a diluted CO2 atmosphere?
